title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: When modifying the default value in the list box of a report parameter, the default value that was previously set is lost. This issue occurs when following the steps to reproduce.
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:

1. Open the report that contains a list box parameter.
2. Set a default value for the list box parameter.
3. Modify the default value of the list box parameter.
4. Observe that the default value that was previously set is lost.
